name: Tolga Balci
bio: Tolga Balci is an enthusiast in Data Analytics, Data Science, and various computer-related fields. He is currently expanding his knowledge in electronics and is open to collaborations on ESP8266, Arduino, and Raspberry Pi development projects. Tolga is active on social media platforms and maintains a personal website on WordPress.

name: Alex Mikhail
bio: Alex Mikhail is a Computer Science graduate from DePaul University with a strong foundation in Python, Java, and JavaScript. He has experience leading client-facing projects and enhancing software platforms for Fortune 500 companies. Alex's background includes internships at Planview and Kolpak Lerner & Grcic LLC, where he demonstrated skills in database management, software testing, and client engagement.

name: Ron Bruintjes
bio: Ron organizes our monthly meetings and special events. With a background in project management and .NET development, they ensure our events run smoothly.

name: Sean Hoar
bio: Sean Hoar is a Full-Stack Software Engineer at Booz Allen Hamilton with 7 years of experience in the industry. He is a React.js specialist and is passionate about building scalable and maintainable systems, and hopes to become one with the spoon before the Agents take over.
